contexts.context: ...for questing heroes hoping to receive Vivec's favor. Many choice <mark>treasures</mark> are guarded by Daedric servants in the Puzzle Canal's dark passages...
...Red Mountain, you struck me down as I guarded the <mark>treasure</mark> you bound me by oath to defend. It was a...
...shall neither hoard nor steal, nor encumber myself with profitless <mark>treasures</mark>, but shall share freely among house and hearth.
